name: CloudBolt Software
overview:
CloudBolt Software, Inc. exists to create and maintain Enterprise IT management software.

CloudBolt Software’s primary product is CloudBolt Command and Control (C2), a vendor-agnostic IT resource management and vending system which allows organizations to rapidly define and deploy enterprise private or hybrid cloud resources to end users.

CloudBolt C2 was created to be independent of the underlying technology it manages, so it supports the industry-leading provisioning systems, virtualization technologies, and server management solutions which organizations are already using. It also was designed to be flexible, and allows for the easy integration and support for additional vendors and technology providers as they become available.

CloudBolt C2 is available in two different editions, each tailored to provide organizations with the specific functionality needed, and at a price point that makes sense for any organization.
